abstract: Pakistani authorities announce arrest of two senior officials of Muttahida Qaumi Movement, political party that has dominated politics in city of Karachi for decades; Pakistani military says officials are charged with facilitating hate speeches against Karachi residents. .
lead_paragraph: Two senior officials with the Muttahida Qaumi Movement, the party that has dominated politics in Karachi for decades, were arrested Friday.

headline.main: Pakistan: Senior Political Officials Arrested in Karachi
headline.print_headline: Asia; Pakistan: Senior Political Officials Arrested in Karachi

snippet: Two senior officials with the Muttahida Qaumi Movement, the party that has dominated politics in Karachi for decades, were arrested Friday.
